string.text: Our hiding place is in the tunnel for now, and our stash is in the pipe. It's a great place to hide, few people know about it, and the anomalies there will discourage anyone from finding it.
Gray's stash
I hid some stuff in a tree stump near the tunnel. It's a convenient place for a stash.
Hollow tree stump
I buried some loot here - under a cross that's near a bush.
The stash under the cross
I've hid my backpack under a fallen tree here.
Backpack under the fallen tree
I put my backpack in a pipe near the factory. No one will find it.
Chimney sweep's backpack
I've stashed the box on the roof of the factory, where no one will see it. It'll rust in the rain.
The box on the roof
I was in caught in shootout; I threw off my backpack and put it under this wagon behind the wheel. Thankfully, the shootout ended, so I'll go get it later.
Drunkard's backpack
I've hidden my stash under the cross here, behind the cisterns. I'll have dig a little to get it, and I'll try to remember to not to overdo it.
Three tanks
At the factory, I put the backpack on the top of the building - so you can't see it from underneath. Sadly, I don't remember exactly what's in it.
Backpack in the porthole
I've hid my stuff in a drawer that's located at this factory.
Radioactive box
There's a stash under the stairs in a drawer here.
Stash under the stairs
I hid my stuff in a drawer here, nobody's gonna check it.
Drawer stash
I dropped my bag outside the window here, I'll pick it up later.
Bag on a support
Kolyan and I had a nice walk at Agroprom, we collected a lot of junk, but we had to hide some of the stuff. We put the stuff inside a box, and put it in the dumpster here.
Dumpster stash
I found a safe under a fallen tree, so I'll hide everything my stuff in here for now.
Safe under the tree

I threw my stuff down the pipe - I'll pick it up later. I had to get rid of my stuff, or I'd have taken it with me, of course. As long my stuff doesn't get wet from the rain, it'll be a good place to hide my stuff.
Pipe stash
The good stuff's in the old pipe, I'll have to tell the boys. I'm not going in there.
Radioactive pipe
I ran away from the base, to hell with them. I'm not going to get shot by stalkers. I hid my clothes in a pipe in the rubble. I'll sit tight until they fly away, then I'll get my clothes back.
Stash in the debris
There's a half-buried safe under a bush here. I've hidden all my stuff in there
The safe in the bush
We've found some box under a support beam, someone dragged it all the way from the research institute. We'll wait for the helicopter, then we'll take it with us.
Archive box
I've hidden my stuff here under this iron hatch.
Stash hidden under the hatch
There's a half-buried safe under a bush here where I hide all my stuff.
Near the wall and under the bush
There's a handy drawer to dump extra junk in here.
Research Institute box
I hid some stuff in the safe, but the military came. I can't the stuff in there now.
Agrosafe
I put some of my stuff in the pipe so that it's safe. I'll pick it up later.
Pipe on the truck bed
I've put some of my stuff in this rotten log here.
Rotten log stash
There's a handy box to dump your junk in here. It was once used to store the institute's equipment - now it's storing some of my stuff.
The institute employee's box
This drawer has come in handy for small things, I used to keep my locksmith tools at home in one of these.
Locksmith's equipment
The bandits are hiding something under the pipe, so we should check it out. From what we're hearing, it's clear that's where their supplies are.
Bandit stash
I hid my backpack behind some concrete, I'm going to travel light. I'd rather be hungry but alive - that backpack was weighing me down.
Backpack in the alley
I've put my stuff in the box behind the rusty barrel in the dungeon. I'm not going back there, no way! I still don't remember by what miracle I survived my encounter with that bloodsucker there.
The bloodsucker's box
There's loot behind the wall here. I'm answering for the goods in store!
Stalker's loot
I've been digging up some valuables. I found sneaky place for my stash - it's at the yellow barrel here, hard to find.
The mole's burrow
I hid my backpack near Duty's base. I'll pick it up later.
A hidden backpack
I was chased by a big pack of dogs. If I hadn't ditched my backpack here, I wouldn't have made it to the outpost.
A backpack left behind
I've put the rest of my stash under the cross here.
The stash under the cross
Dropped my backpack here - it'll be easier that way.
Backpack stash
This outpost that's owned by Duty has a chest in a bunker that stores the gear used by the guards. No one keeps an eye on it.
Bunker storage chest
I saw a Dutyer shove something down a pipe that's near the outpost. I've marked it here.
Secret stash
All of this stuff belongs to another stalker, so he can keep it here for now.
The hiding place under the cross
I'm going to the bar. I left my backpack in the hangar - no one will find it there.
Backpack stash
They say that there's something valuable hidden on the Duty's territory in the electrical box.
Electrical box stash
I put a box on top of the tower near the Duty base so that no one would notice it.
Secret stash near Duty base
I've hidden my stuff in a pipe under some stairs here.
Secret stash

I hid the goods not far from the bar, behind the anomalies - nobody will get in there. And even they got there they wouldn't know how to open it. But it's all very simple - just pull up at the door, and everything will open.
Arnie's secret stash
I buried some good loot near the bar. I've marked the stash here.
Secret stash
There's a box by the bar here. I've hid some of my stuff in it.
Box
I've made a stash with a box and put it in a nook near the bar.
Nook stash
I buried some stuff under the cross here, behind the trees.
Secret stash
I've put some of my stuff under the cross that's near the passageway to the Wild Territory.
Secret stash
I stashed a box of antirads in a pipe near the arena.
Antirad stash
I hid my clothes in the pipe under the tower, I've marked its located here.
Secret stash
There's a stash buried under the cross here.
Secret stash
I hid army supplies in a train car during regrouping. I need to remember where it is, so I've marked it here.
Train car above the bridge
I saw a stalker go down under an anomaly by the train tunnel in the woods. Seemed like he had some pretty good stuff.
Things belonging to the stalker who perished in the anomaly
I've hid some of my loot under the cross near the bandit camp. I've marked the location here.
The cross near the bandits' camp
The chest stolen by the bandits has been found in the cellar of the central building. Need to prepare a detachment and get it.
Bandits' warehouse
When my comrades and I were fighting off the dogs in uniform, I buried some goods under the bridge. Let them stay there for now.
Stash under the cross
I stuck the backpack in the cellar. I'll be back later - can't get to it right now.
Shelter in the cellar
I've found a half-buried safe at the farm, I'll keep my stuff in it for now.
Safe at the farm
A little bird told me that somebody's hiding something in the train car on the bridge. Will need to check it out on the way back. I wonder who...
Container in the train car
Hid the goods right under the roof of the little house by the bridge.
Goods of the shooter
I killed a soldier recently, found a nice gun on him, decided to take it for myself. I stashed my old TT and some loot near the bridge.
Old Tokarev pistol and loot stash
One of the stalkers died near the newbies' camp. Check out his goods.
The backpack near the village
Found out from Lihoi that the secret stash is in the cellar. He was talking too much so we shut him up for good, and I took his PDA.
Cellar in the village
Found a great hiding place in the cellar. I'll wait until someone puts something in there.
A good place
Found out from Vorpal that there's a secret stash in the cellar. Our men were carrying out a scouting expedition in the area. Let's check it out.
Vorpal's secret stash
They say that the commander has a tricky chest in his office, and there's a ton of valuable goods there.
The valuables of the commander
Some stalker died not far from the camp of the newbies. We should see what he was carrying. Who lets them in here anyway?
Near the country road
The goodies are hidden in the bandits' cellar. They weren't there before so let's wait for the right time to take them all.
The robbers' cellar
Discovered some loot being stored in a pipe that's not far from the farm. Once the stockade is over, I'll definitely come back.
Gas pipe
I've temporarily left a chest at the tower, I've marked its location on the map. I'll pick it up when I can.
Hidden stash
I've temporarily left a chest at the tower, I've marked its location on the map. I'll pick it up when I can.
Tower at the checkpoint
I saw how a bandit hid his goods in a chest in the hangar. How can I quietly steal it?
Bandits' storage
I killed a stalker the other day. Hid all his loot by the crane. There's something odd about the gun he had though, it looks really old. I've never the type of gun he had before.
Bandit's loot
Grizzly died while carrying all of his stuff with him at the Garbage, in the train tunnel behind the diesel locomotive. Pity about Grizzly.
Grizzly's things
Stowed the goodies away in a pipe at the garbage.
Pipe on the North pile
The things are in the garbage, in one of the pipes. If you don't know exactly where they are, you won't find them.
Extra cash in the scrap metal
I hid the stuff in a metal pipe next to the two cisterns. I should pick it up, but don't have the time.
Iron furnace next to the cistern
There are some useful things hidden among the radioactive waste, where few hang around.
Pipe on the East pile
Someone's backpack is lying around in the valley, with anomalies all around. How could you get to it?
Nobody's backpack
Finished off the traitor in the swamp... we buried him there too and left his goodies under the cross. Had more important things to worry about.
The belongings of the murdered one
There's a secret stash in the stump here - this is a good place to hide stuff.
Rotted stump
There's a log in the forest with a hold inside. In the hole there's treasure - it's time to get it.
Log in the forest

Petrenko wanted to pass on the word that there's information about the secret stash of the Strelok faction at the Garbage. Here in the valley floor there has to be a manhole, he explained how there's a trick to opening it. As soon as everything calms down, we gotta go there and check it out.
Strelok's group stash
I hid my stash in the car, the Long One said it was a good place
Secret stash in the car
I put the backpack in the bus - seems unnoticeable.
Stalker's backpack in the bus
I put my stash in a box that's in a strange little house around the corner. I still don't know what that building was for.
Outhouse supplies
There's a safe partially buried in a pile of trash here. There's a lot of good stuff in it. Better not forget about it.
Safe in the South pile
I put some of my loof in a pipe that's sitting on a pile of trash here.
Storage in the scrap metal yard
The head of radio communications passed along a message to us: retreat. I found a chest, threw in what I had on me, and retreated empty-handed.
Supplies in the chest
I put the loot into a pipe at this location in the Garbage. It won't stay there for long.
Pipe by the bus
I managed to hide my backpack in the ruins here well - it's almost impossible to notice it. Hopefully, it'll be easy to retrieve if the bandits don't interfere.
The Backpack is in the Ruins
While the dutyers were shooting, I hid my loot in the train car. Somehow I have to get in to pick it up, and I gotta thank Duty sometime.
Chest at the heavily armed military checkpoint
They say that Weakling choked at the Garbage - need to drop by to check out the goods. Otherwise there'll be many interested parties coming in.
Weakling's backpack
For now I'll hide my loot in the pothole. Maybe they won't find them.
String bag in the pothole
An anomaly got someone by the escalator - the backpack is in view, but hard to get to.
Under the backhoe bucket
Barely made it under the beams, but at least the backpack's well hidden - nobody will try to climb in here.
The extra cash is under the concrete blocks
Stuck the goods into a log, don't think they'll find them.
Goodies in the log
Stuck my backpack into the furnace, it'll come in handy later.
Furnace secret stash
I hid my loot in this rusting Kamaz - it's a good place to hide my stuff.
Secret stash in Kamaz truck
Buried some goodies under the cross by the village.
Treasure under the cross
Threw my things into the pipe at this location marked on the map, will pick them up later.
Secret stash in the pipe
There's a secret stash in the chest inside the water tower.
Treasure in the water tower
I put my backpack in the stove here, the stuff in it will come in handy later.
Secret stash in a stove
Hid my loot in the car right next to the the Freedom base, didn't have any time to look for a better place.
Secret stash in the car
Hid the loot in the car here at the abandoned village.
Dangerous secret
I buried my loot under an cross in a hidden place.
Stalker's stash
Hid away the backpack with the equipment in a cozy spot.
Backpack with equipment
Hid my loot in the car on a hill.
Secret stash on a hill
A helicopter fell right by the abandoned military base, and the chest is right there, under the helicopter. One problem - there are anomalies all over the place, along with radioactive hot spots.
Chest from the helicopter
Buried the loot on the hill, under the cross at this location.
Secret in the tombstone
There's a secret stash in the stump - a good place for hiding loot.
Secret stump
I left my backpack in the cabin of the crane. I'll pick it up later.
Secret stash in the crane cabin
Everything is in the chest, in a train car not far from the base. That's how we planned it, now all we have to do is wait.
The agreed-upon secret stash
Put my loot in a log here, don't think anyone will find my stuff.
Goodies in the log
Stuffed my loot into a pipe that's at the shore of the lake.
Pipe with loot
Buried my loot under the cross in a hidden place.
Stalker's stash
Stuffed some loot into a log here, I don't think anyone will find it.
Treasure in a log
I found a good spot to store my loot here.
A convenient hiding place
I hid the backpack with the loot in the tunnel.
Backpack in the tunnel
I put my loot into the chest here - I'll get the loot later.
Crate with goodies
I put my loot in a log here, don't think anyone will find my stuff.
Log with a secret stash
Put the loot into the chest - I'll get the loot later.
Temporary secret stash
Hid some loot in the manhole at this location. The stuff I hid will come in handy one day.
Manhole secret stash
I put my loot into the chest here - I'll get the loot later.
Chest with loot
Hid my loot in the car right next to the the Freedom base, didn't have any time to look for a better place.
Secret stash in the car
They say that some famous stalker kicked the bucket here, and nobody's picked up his belongings yet.
Things of the dead stalker
They say there's a chest in the garage with a ton of loot inside it.
Treasure in the garage
They say there's a chest in the kindergarten with a ton of loot inside it.
Old secret stash
They buried Fang in Pripyat under a monument. They left all of his belongings with him - it's not right to take away from the dead.
Fang's loot

The last that they knew about him is that he was the sole survivor after the scorcher. He left all the supplies in some old supermarket, and moved on out. Everything didn't go as planned, and people also say that he was the best leader of Freedom in all of our history.
Supplies of the leader of Freedom
The cross is on the way to the scorcher, didn't go any further, hid everything there under it.
Murk's treasure
Some stalker perished here, and his belongings are still lying around, nobody can get to them.
Dead stalker's belongings
They say that there's a half-buried safe in the forest and there's a bunch of loot inside it.
Loot in the safe

They told them not to fly over the Scorcher, and look what happened. They landed in the middle of the forest, and it's unlikely that anyone survived. We were supposed to get the stuff that was with them.
Package for Duty

They say that the supplies of the faction, who were trying to get to the center of the Zone, is still inside the area of the Red Forest that's affected by the Brain Scorcher. None of them returned, and the supplies remained there waiting for someone to pick them up.
Supplies of the reckless group
They say that the leader of some former faction croaked here, and there was a valuable amount of loot with him.
Loot of the leader of the former faction
Hid my backpack filled with loot behind the iron plate here.
Hidden backpack
Stashed some loot under the cross.
Secret stash under the cross
Hid a little something in the chest under the little house. Shouldn't forget about it.
Chest under the small house
I was about to hide my backpack under the steps, but then those jerks appeared. Man, how will I get it back?
Stalker's backpack
There's a half buried safe in the corner behind the tree. That's where all my loot will be for now.
Secret stash behind the tree
They hid all of their loot in a chest in the garage that they took over during the raid.
Secret stash in the garage
Hid some things in the chest behind the booth.
Hidden chest
Stuck the backpack in a hole. Seems unnoticeable from above.
Backpack in the secret stash
Hid the small chest in a safe spot.
Chest in a safe spot
My backpack is up right under the roof here. It's there for a rainy day.
Stalker's secret stash
They say there's a safe in that little house, and that there's something in it.
Safe in the house
I hid some loot in the house in a pipe. Careful, everything's out of whack there.
Secret stash in the pipe
Take what we talked about from the chest. Usually nobody looks in there.
Hidden chest
I hid my loot under a cross that's in a nook.
Secret stash under the cross
They hid the extra supplies under the concrete at the construction site. Might be worth looking into.
Secret stash under the concrete
In case we need to take off quickly, we'll put the loot into the crate at the construction site.
Stash of the Lucky One
I hid some loot in one of the side streets at the construction site.
Nychka
Stuck everything into some pipe - will pick it up later.
Secret stash in the pipe
Hid some medicine in a chest not far from the construction site.
Chest with medicine
I moved the crate into the cabin of the crane.
Chest in the crane
Hid my loot in a manhole in the corner.
Secret stash in the manhole
Went after the artifact and got into an anomaly. I was barely able to walk and dropped the backpack in the corner.
The dropped backpack
Stuck the chest right under the roof by the tower so that nobody would notice.
Small chest under the roof
We hid what we found in the pipe not far from the construction site.
Secret stash in the pipe
Stuck some loot into the log. Don't think they'll find it.
Secret stash
I dropped my backpack near by the crane. I've hidden it well.
Backpack
I hid some of my loot under the cross by the mountain.
Secret stash under the cross
I put some of my loot in a log here, don't think anyone will find it.
Secret stash in the log
I hid my backpack under the bridge. I'm going to hide it there for now.
Backpack under the bridge
I put the chest into the car by the swamp. No one will find it there.
Car with the secret stash
There's a secret stash in a stump - good place for it.
Secret stash in a stump
I found a great chest at the farm. I'll use it as a supply stash for now.
Chest with supplies
Threw my things into the pipe at this location marked on the map, will pick them up later.
Secret stash in the pipe
I hid my backpack under a pine tree. It'll be safe there.
Secret stash under the pine tree

The newbie ended up stealing the chest from the bandits. He put it into the Niva which turned up side down. He says that by the looks of it, it's a government chest. We'll have to arm our guys and take it.
Government chest
There are robberies everywhere. They're even stealing even from their own... but they'll never find my chest.
Chest
I hid some of my things in the manhole. Maybe they'll come in handy some day.
Secret stash in the manhole
I got rid of my backpack and hid it under a tree. Otherwise, I wouldn't have escaped the bandits - it was weighing me down.
Stalker's backpack
Put my junk into a pipe, will pick it up later.
Secret stash
Everything I stole from Borov I hid away in a safe under the pine tree. Now I have to wait it out while they finish freaking out.
Hidden safe
The temporary headquarters are in the train car, as is the chest with the supplies.
Warehouse in the train car
Barely made it into the pipe under the road. Now I'll have a place to hide my backpack.
Secret place in the pipe
Threw the goods into the chest - will get them later.
Crate with goods
I'm hiding my loot behind the pipe here - it's hard to get to, but at least they won't take off with it.
Secret stash behind the pipe
Found some cartridges in the electrical room.
Secret stash in the electrical room
We left everything that we found in the chest, we'll pick it up when we're returning.
Secret stash in the chest
I hid the backpack that I stole from an newbie stalker. He never found it.
Hidden backpack
The chest was left in the van - needs to be picked up.
Forgotten chest
Found a safe at the gas station and hid some of my stuff in it. Seems like nobody ever goes there.
Safe at the gas station
I dragged this chest that I can use for loot into the cistern here. It's a good, well-hidden spot for it.
Chest
I hid some of my loot in the safe at the gas station.
Safe at the gas station
There's some chest in the car at the bandits' camp. We need to sneak into the car and check it out - I feel there's something in there.
Chest in the car
I put the chest where the secret stash is. It's a good place to hide stuff. (start here for your second revision session on 2/29/24 and don't forget to remove this reminder when you start)
Secret stash in the chest
I left the backpack in an abandoned building. There's nobody around, so no one will find it.
The left-behind backpack
We'll store the goods in a nondescript place. If the soldiers don't come today, then they'll come tomorrow. They won't look around for very long so the most valuable stuff will be left for me.
Borov's secret stash
I stashed away my backpack near by the building here.
Backpack in a secret place
Stashed some loot in a nondescript chest. I'll get it later.
Nondescript chest
I hid the backpack under the car, nobody will bother looking there.
Hidden backpack
Hid the loot in the car right under the bandits' noses, didn't have time to look for a better place.
Secret stash in the car
Rumor has it that there was a stalker who got into the lab and hid his loot in the electrical outlets in the elevator shaft. When it came time to pick it up, he couldn't.
Loot in the electrical outlets
Rumor has it that there was a stalker who penetrated into this lab and he knocked off in the area where they were carrying out the experiments, with all of his loot.
Scout's backpack

Smoked put everything into a safe in the underground laboratory. Not a bad place - nobody has the keys to the lab. Only problem is, there are rocks that start flying all over the place all of a sudden. They say someone got killed by those flying rocks.
Secret stash of Smoked
I had to leave my backpack here.
The left-behind backpack
The cross is on a hill, and the backpack has been buried under it.
Secret stash under the cross
They say there's a half-buried safe on a small island in the swamp. I need to learn more about it.
Old safe
Stuck the goods into a pipe by the camp.
Pipe with goods
I stashed away some loot behind the garages.
Backpack behind the garages
I hid away my backpack in a booth, right behind the scrap metal.
Backpack with the loot
I hid the chest in the bus - seems unnoticeable.
Secret stash in the bus
The loot is hidden in the car not far from the territory. The radiation is not very high.
The loot is in the car
They say there's somebody's belongings hidden around here, but nobody can get to it because of the radiation.
Old backpack
They say that there's a secret stash of some group here. I wonder how they managed to stash their goods there with all of the radiation?
Secret stash belonging to a group

Another volunteer stalker croaked because another prototype didn't protect him from the radiation. He only made it to the middle of the territory, and stayed there. Sakharov wants to take more precise measurements, but I won't go, else I'll end up staying there myself, not far from the territory.
Tester's backpack
They say that there is somebody's loot here, but there's no way to get to it because of the radiation.
Old secret stash

Gotta take off, Sakharov and Kruglov are total psychos - they want me to go with some stalker into the center of radiation. Screw them, as soon as I gather all the supplies in the manhole, I'm taking off.
Scientist's secret stash
I stuffed some loot into a log, don't think anyone will find it.
Treasure in a log
They say that there's somebody's toolbox here, stuffed with loot, but there's no way to get to it because of the radiation.
Toolbox with loot
Stash information received:
